main.name: Yong Cheng Low
main.description: I aspire to use modern day technologies to improve the lives of others and give users the best possible user interface and user experience

bio.para1: Hello everyone, I am Yong Cheng or my friends call me YC for short. I studied at the National University of Singapore and I minor in Interactive Media Design. I hope to use technology to improve the efficiency of the workforce and ensuring that employees or clients get the best possible user experience and user interface.
bio.para2: Some of my works include generation of material list given a particular specification of a circuit board at CMR Far East. I also interned at Cudy, and edutech startup who tried to transform the educational industry through online tuition. During my time there, I was given the opportunity to design the user interfaces and enhance the user experience of the payment gateway using Xfers and live streaming using Temasys.
bio.para3: I also have a passion for sports and organising events to benefit others. During my pre-tertiary education, I was part of the school team for Badminton and Basketball. I joined the NUS Students' Computing Club as Vice President (Human Resources & Student Development) to create a vibrant campus life for NUS Computing students. During my final year of University, I decided to go out of my comfort zone to take up Presidency at NUS Students' Sports Club to influence the entire sporting scene in NUS. I was given the opportunity to work with students, and various companies who were interested in recreational sports such as ActiveSG, HPB, People's Association, FBT, The Tea Party etc.
bio.para4: Find me interesting? Send me an email and let's chat

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
